    • beenSwept

      public boolean beenSwept(int x, int y)
      determines if space has been swept previously.
      Parameters:
      x - is the user's x-coordinate.
      y - is the user's y-coordinate.
      Returns:
      false is the space has not been swept previously.

    • treasureFound

      public boolean treasureFound(int x, int y)
      Determines if treasure is found at user's coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - is the user's x-coordinate.
      y - is the user's y-coordinate.
      Returns:
      true if treasure is found.

    • checkOutOfBounds

      public boolean checkOutOfBounds(int x, int y)
      Determines if user's coordinates are within the parameters of the 2D array.
      Parameters:
      x - is user's x-coordinate.
      y - is user's y-coordinate.
      Returns:
      true if user's coordinates are within game board parameters.

    • getBoardHeight

      public int getBoardHeight()
      Returns:
      game board column length.

    • getBoardWidth

      public int getBoardWidth()
      Returns:
      game board row length.

    • getTotalMoves

      public int getTotalMoves()
      Returns:
      number of total moves.

    • digSand

      public boolean digSand(int x, int y)
      Checks array at specified coordinates. If treasure is not found, calculates Manhattan distance. Updates array to contain the Manhattan distance from treasure at that point.
      Parameters:
      x - user's x-coordinate.
      y - user's y-coordinate.
      Returns:
      true if treasure is found.

      public String toString()
      Creates a StringBuilder object to display the game board to the user.

      Returns:
      StringBuilder object.
